name: Illuminate (Built Different Studios)
description:
Illuminate

A little bit of light can get you through the darkest times 

Illuminate is a 2D puzzle platformer where a young child and a friendly spirit must work together to traverse a pitch black world to bring an end to the darkness. You must use the spirit's light to explore the world, solve puzzles, distract enemies, and reveal hidden objects in the game. 

Built Different Studios:

  • Thomas Borich
  • Sebastian Stanham
  • Jonathan Tom
  • Henry Jin
  • Devin Liang

Special thanks to:

  • Julien Faro
